activities: Bristol Global Mobility provides global relocation mobility services to multinational clients and their relocating employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Bristol collects information that the relocating employee voluntarily provides to us via email or through registration in the BRISTOL Elite database. This information includes name, address, phone number , email address and other information necessary for us to provide services.  This data does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Bristol only has access and collects information that the employee voluntarily provides to us directly or through registration into the Bristol Elite database.  We do not share this information with any third party outside of our organization, other than as necesssary to fulfill service order requests for which we were hired.  See privacy policy on website.
recoursemech: If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy policy or practices, please contact us at privacypolicy@Bristolglobal.com. If you are not satisfied with our response you can contact VeraSafe https://www.verasafe.com/dispute-submission.
